note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
title: Death rate from unsafe sanitation
subtitle: Estimated annual number of deaths attributed to [unsafe sanitation](#dod:unsafe_sanitation) per 100,000 people. This is calculated as the 'attributable burden'.  Attributable burden represents the reduction in deaths if a population's exposure had shifted from unsafe to adequate sanitation facilities.
